SEARCH
Package entity.tower

Class Tower

java.lang.Object
entity.tower.Tower
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chef, Owner, Princess
public abstract class Tower extends Object
This class represents a tower in the game. It serves as a base class for all types of towers and contains common elements and functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tower

      public Tower(int x, int y, int id, int towerType, int atk, float range, float cooldown)
      Initializes the tower with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position of the tower (pixel)
      y - the y position of the tower (pixel)
      id - the id of the tower
      towerType - the type of the tower
      atk - the ATK (attack) value of the tower
      range - the attack range of the tower
      cooldown - the attack cooldown of the tower

    • toggleAnimationStatus

      public void toggleAnimationStatus()
      Toggle the animation status of the tower. If the current animation status is 1, it will be changed to 0, and if the current animation status is 0, it will be changed to 1.
